00002  *  skimNoNoiseBolos.cxx

00010 
00011 #include "KDataReader.h"
00012 #include "KDataWriter.h"
00013 #include "TFile.h"
00014 #include "TH1I.h"
00015 #include "KHLAEvent.h"
00016 #include "KEvent.h"
00017 #include "KHLAMuonModuleSubRecord.h"
00018 #include "KHLASingleBoloSubRecord.h"
00019 #include "KHLASambaSubRecord.h"
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include "TString.h"
00023 #include "TClonesArray.h"
00024 #include "TProcessID.h"
00025 
00026 using namespace std;
00027 
00028 int main(int argc, char* argv[] )
00029 {
00030         
00031         cout << "Skimming Out Bolometer Noise Events (fEventFlag == 0) ";
00032         
00033         TString inEDSFile = argv[1];
00034         TString outFile = argv[2];
00035         Int_t i = 3;
00036         Int_t fEventFlagCut = -1;
00037         
00038   while ( i < argc ){
00039 
00040                 if( strcmp(argv[i],"--eventFlag") == 0 ){
00041       fEventFlagCut = atoi(argv[++i]);
00042       if(fEventFlagCut > 0 && fEventFlagCut < 6)
00043                                 cout << " only include events with EventFlag set to " << fEventFlagCut;
00044                         else {
00045                                 cout << " ignoring invalid Event Flag cut: " << fEventFlagCut << endl;
00046                                 fEventFlagCut = -1;
00047                         }
00048                                 
00049     }
00050     
00051     else{
00052       cout << endl;
00053       cout << argv[i] << " is not a recognized option." << endl << endl;
00054     }
00055     i++;
00056   }
00057   cout << endl << endl;
00058  
00059         cout << "Input file         " << inEDSFile.Data() << endl;
00060         cout << "Output file        " << outFile.Data() << endl;
00061         
00062         KDataWriter fOutEds(outFile.Data(), "HLA", "recreate");
00063         KEvent *eout = fOutEds.GetEvent();
00064         KHLAEvent *mEout =  dynamic_cast<KHLAEvent*>( eout );
00065         
00066         KDataReader fEdsFile(inEDSFile.Data());
00067         KEvent *ein = fEdsFile.GetEvent();
00068         KHLAEvent *mEv = dynamic_cast<KHLAEvent*>( ein );
00069         
00070         if(mEv == 0) return -1;
00071         if(mEout == 0) return -1;
00072         
00073         Bool_t isGoodEvent = false;
00074         Int_t counter = 0;
00075         do
00076         {
00077                 isGoodEvent =  false;
00078                 mEout->Clear("C");
00079                 Int_t ObjectNumber = TProcessID::GetObjectCount();
00080                 
00081                 *mEout = *mEv;
00082                 
00083                 mEout->IsSame(*mEv, true); //is there a problem with the Stamp? 
00084                 
00085                 if(mEv->GetNumBolos() > 0){
00086                         //manually clear out all of the bolo sub records and
00087                         //samba records. then add them back in accordingly if they
00088                         //are valid. 
00089                         mEout->GetBoloSubRecords()->Clear("C");
00090                         mEout->GetSambaSubRecords()->Clear("C");
00091                         mEout->SetNumBolo(0);
00092                         mEout->SetNumSamba(0);
00093                         for(Int_t i = 0; i < mEv->GetNumBolos(); i++){
00094                                 if(mEv->GetBolo(i)->GetEventFlag() > 0 &&
00095                                          (fEventFlagCut > 0 ? mEv->GetBolo(i)->GetEventFlag()==fEventFlagCut : true)
00096                                          ){  //0 are 'noise' events.
00097                                         isGoodEvent = true;
00098                                         //this should be the same as cutting events where the EventFlag == 0
00099                                         KHLASingleBoloSubRecord *inBolo = mEv->GetBolo(i);
00100                                         KHLASingleBoloSubRecord *outBolo = mEout->AddBolo();
00101                                         KHLASambaSubRecord *outSamba = mEout->AddSamba();
00102                                         *outBolo = *inBolo;  //copy the bolo sub record
00103                                         KHLASambaSubRecord *inSamba = inBolo->GetSambaRecord();
00104                                         //cout << "Copying Samba Record" << endl;
00105                                         *outSamba = *inSamba; //copy the samba sub record information 
00106                                         //cout << "Setting Samba Record" << endl;
00107                                         
00108                                         //cout << "GetSambaRecord in: " << inBolo->GetSambaRecord() << endl;
00109                                         //cout << "GetSambaRecord out: " << outBolo->GetSambaRecord() << endl;
00110                                         outBolo->SetSambaRecord(outSamba);
00111                                         //cout << "GetSambaRecord in: " << inBolo->GetSambaRecord() << endl;
00112                                         //cout << "GetSambaRecord out: " << outBolo->GetSambaRecord() << endl;
00113                                         
00114                                 }
00115                         }
00116                         
00117                 }
00118                 
00119                 if(mEv->GetNumMuonModules() > 0)
00120                         isGoodEvent = true;
00121                 
00122                 if(isGoodEvent)
00123                         fOutEds.Fill();
00124                 
00125                 if(++counter % 50000 == 0)
00126                         cout << "Processing event " << counter << " out of " << fEdsFile.GetEntries() << endl;
00127                 
00128                 //Restore Object count                                                                                                     
00129                 //To save space in the table keeping track of all referenced objects 
00130                 //and computation time,
00131                 //we assume that our events do not address each other. We reset the                                                        
00132                 //object count to what it was at the beginning of the event.                                                               
00133                 TProcessID::SetObjectCount(ObjectNumber);
00134                 
00135         } while(fEdsFile.GetNextEntry() > 0);
00136         
00137         fOutEds.Write();
00138         fOutEds.Close();
00139         fEdsFile.Close();
00140         return 1;
00141 }
